=== Wolfgang Lonien ===

Email: 
You can get informations about Wolfgang Lonien at his personal blog<<BR>>http://wolfgang.lonien.de/, his community blog<<BR>>http://blog.thedebianuser.org/, and at his company website<<BR>>http://www.zareason.de/.

Wolfgang is no great coder, but a system administrator, and a long time supporter of the Debian GNU/Linux project. His blog pages are aggregated on http://planetsysadmin.com/ and on http://debian-community.org/planets/en/, and he's also a team member of LXer Linux News.

He founded the European branch of http://www.zareason.com/, and like them he is offering pre-installed Ubuntu hardware to the community.
